|website page = [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=652dc3aa-4944-4cb4-8349-f10aece14602 LALIGA Skin Pack in Minecraft Marketplace]

'''LALIGA Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.laliga.com/en-GB/news/laliga-enters-adventure-block-game-space-with-minecraft|title=LaLiga enters adventure block game space with Minecraft|date=September 26, 2022|website=laliga.com}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that crosses over with {{Wikipedia|La Liga}}, the top men's professional football division of the Spanish football league system. Created by Blockception, it follows the [[LaLiga Skin Pack]] and includes 80 skins of La Liga players wearing {{Wikipedia|Kit (association football)|kits}} for the 2023/24 season.
